# The `UnwindCode` Union Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/unions/llvm/win64eh/unwindcode">UnwindCode</a> - This union describes a single operation in a function prolog, or part thereof. <a href="#details">More...</a>
